participant_1.background:
I spend too much time playing with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
My father doesn't approve of my music.
I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend.
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.

I love reading about different cultures and their food, so my favorite food is always changing.
I am afraid that I will lose my ability to enjoy nature or technology.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
my best friend is gay.
i work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What kind of music are you interested in?
I'm really into all kinds of music, but my favorites are probably rock, indie, and alternative. What about you?
I love rock and indie too! I'm also a big fan of electronic music.
Nice! I love electronic music too. What are some of your favorite bands?
Oh man, I have so many! Right now, I'm really into The 1975, The xx, and Tame Impala.
I love Tame Impala! I've been listening to their new album a lot lately.
Me too! It's so good. What's your favorite song on the album?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say "The Less I Know the Better."
That's a great song! I love the music video for it too.
Me too! It's so trippy and cool.
So, what are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm just working on some music. I'm trying to finish a song for my band.
Oh cool! What kind of music does your band play?
We play alternative rock.
Nice! I'd love to hear your music sometime.
Sure! I'll send you a link to our website.
Great! Thanks!
No problem
